      • truncate

        long truncate(long truncateLength)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Truncates the fork to truncateLength. If truncateLength >= the current fork length no action
        Parameters:
        truncateValue -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • extend

        long extend(long extendLength)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Extends the fork to extendLength. New data area will return zero's. If exendLength is less then or equal to the current fork length no action
        Parameters:
        extendLength -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
